{
  You can say stuff, including math: $x^2-1=0$. 

 That's a paragraph break. 

 \textsf{Jupyter-Viz} is how you reference package names and \texttt{StubForTesting} (\ref{StubForTesting}) is how you reference functions. You can also insert man page sections. 

\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{StubForTesting}}
\logpage{[ 1, 1, 1 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X80D3745E78114237}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\enspace\texttt{StubForTesting({\mdseries\slshape k})\index{StubForTesting@\texttt{StubForTesting}}
\label{StubForTesting}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (function)}}\\


 This function adds 5 to its input. That's all. 
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=!@|,fontsize=\small,frame=single,label=Example]
  !gapprompt@gap>| !gapinput@StubForTesting(100);|
  105
\end{Verbatim}
 }
